The protocol of the server (http or http: The protocol of the server (http or https). This is not the open telemetry protocol!
The hostname of the target server/otelco: The hostname of the target server/otelcol gateway
The port of the otelcol gateway. Usually: The port of the otelcol gateway. Usually 4317 (gRPC) or 4318 (http)
The protocol used to send telemetry data: The protocol used to send telemetry data/metrics (gRPC or http (protobuf))
The name of the create SDK meter. Usuall: The name of the create SDK meter. Usually this is only SDK internal
A key-value list of headers to add to ea: A key-value list of headers to add to each request. This is how authentication may be configured
A key-value list of resource attributes: A key-value list of resource attributes to globally populate
Overwrites the name of the metric to exp: Overwrites the name of the metric to export
Attributes to attach to this data-point': Attributes to attach to this data-point's metric
